content.title: Create Recipient Details
content.body:
Let’s get started!

In this hike, you will learn how to:

  • Create a recipient details form
  • Create the UI for the create payee form using services
  • Add the feature for deleting the recipients

Before you get started, complete the hike:

  1. Import & Launch a Web App
  2. Create UI from Collections
  3. Add Authentication to the App
  4. Creating Services for a Web App
  5. Connect App UI to Data in a Web App
    6.

Ensure that you open the same project that you have created in the previous hikes.

To open a closed project, from the main menu, navigate to Project > Open > HCL Reference Architecture > RecipientsWebApp.

When you are ready, click Start!
